examples: She wants to become a doctor.
I hope to become a better person.
The caterpillar will become a butterfly.
Ela quer se tornar uma médica.
Espero me tornar uma pessoa melhor.
A lagarta se tornará uma borboleta.

suggested: Why did the tomato turn red? Because it saw the salad dressing! It wanted to become a salad too.
The caterpillar is so envious of the butterfly's wings. It wants to become something beautiful too.
Why is everyone telling me to 'just be yourself'? What if I want to become someone else?
The caterpillar doesn't just become a butterfly, it completely transforms into a new being.
The smell of freshly baked cookies makes any house become a home.
The soft, cozy blanket on my bed makes my room become a sanctuary.
The more I practice, the more I become connected to my yoga practice.
